column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Stating the obvious here
column2: there are great steak restos all over Chicago that I've been so why return? This place is part of the same restaurant group as Maude's
column3: Gilt and Au Chavel and I've had great meals in all three
column4: and once a very long time ago here. Granted
column5: I didn't order the same thing then as I did last night
